name: Youchef
0:
”Alexa open youchef”
”Alexa, ask youchef for the next step”
”Can you repeat that step?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: youchef
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Simply enter your recipe at https://youchef.io, tell Alexa your recipe name or unique recipe code, and start cooking!

Start the youchef app with the phrase "Alexa open youchef".

Alexa will read your recipe to you step by step, and you can ask her to repeat instructions, or for the quantity of a particular ingredient at any time.

If Alexa is idle for more than 10 seconds, return to your recipe with the phrase, "Alexa ask youchef for...", otherwise you can skip this part and dive right in with commands like "what's the next step?"
